name: ACIER ALUMINIUM
description: Every man will feel like a knight in shining armour in Creed's Acier Aluminium fragrance. Inspired by the armour of interlocking metal (known as chain mail) worn by knights in the Middle Ages, Acier Aluminium makes a statement of unmistakably masculine strength and power; in fact, the French word 'acier' translates as high steel.
